title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 December 2015 - XWiki
content:
<iphar> has joined #xwiki  
04:20 <benoitc> has quit  
04:23 <benoitc> has joined #xwiki  
04:32 <OSIMasson1> has quit  
07:59 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:30 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:35 <Ramona2> has joined #xwiki  
08:43 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:10 <vmassol> good morning  
09:10 <vmassol> going to start the 6.4.7 release in a few minutes  
09:14 <tmortagne> has quit  
09:26 <vmassol> hmm FYI I'm having a skype issue this morning  
09:27 <vmassol> (some of my messages are not sent)  
09:43 <Inge-> on computer or mobile device?  
09:43 <vmassol> computer  
09:43 <Inge-> i've had lots of issues with that with mobile devices - and also when conversing with developers behind The Great Firewall  
09:43 <vmassol> k  
09:44 <vmassol> thans  
09:44 <vmassol> thanks  
10:17 <benoitc> has quit  
10:17 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <Ramona2> has quit  
10:31 <vmassol> we're pretty ambitious :)  
10:31 <vmassol> for 7.4RC1 we have 20 issues planned ATM  
10:31 <vmassol> and only 2 days left  
10:31 <Inge-> is release on Friday or Monday?  
10:31 <vmassol> Monday  
10:32 <vmassol> http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Roadmaps/  
10:36 <Inge-> Well then.  
10:38 <Inge-> Noooo Proooblem:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?list=PL9B1543FBFFB18EDD&v=bs\_0XwYOQik  (33 seconds)  
10:39 <benoitc> has joined #xwiki  
10:49 <vmassol> hehe Inge- :)  
10:50 <vmassol> and actually quite true…  
10:51 <Inge-> unfortunately :)  
10:53 <Pbas> Hi about http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12570 "Access right doesn't work well with subgroups", I add a groovy script to fix my group but the scheduler doesn't want launch it (I can launch it manually form Scheduler page anyway)  
10:53 <Pbas> I use xwiki 7.0.1  
10:57 <Pbas> Where can I watch scheduler log?  
10:57 <vmassol> Pbas: unfortunately as of now there are no logs genertaed by the scheduler  
10:57 <vmassol> you'll need to add logs in your job  
10:58 <vmassol> what I usually do is write logs to another wiki page from inside my scheduler job  
10:58 <Pbas> ok but it is sttrange because the script working well if I launch it manually from scheduler  
10:58 <Pbas> yep it is what I thinking  
11:00 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:00 <Pbas> I will add this log thxs

15:39 <Pbas> Hello (again :-) I try to delete some activityStream event with a nice form with velocity. I display all activityEvents with a checkbox list and I pass ActivityEvent with $request.getParameterValues('IdEntry').  
15:40 <Pbas> Unfortunaly $xwiki.activitystream.deleteActivityEvent($MyEvent) doesn't work.  
15:40 <Pbas> Do you know wich event Id I can use in my checkbox list to delete it after with deleteActivityEvent method? Thxs  
16:15 <vmassol> ok, switching to XWIKI-12912  
16:15 <vmassol> I need to find out to authenticate the user
